Title: PLAYING ROBLOX
Description:
You're moments away from playing with other Gamers among the RoGaming Community!
​

Questions.Question: What game will you be playing?
Questions.Example: Please refer to the gaming category in our Community Server for game options
Questions.Name: Game

Questions.Question: Information
Questions.Name: Info
Questions.Example: Please type below all the information / description regarding this play session.

Questions.Question: Time of play:
Questions.Name: Date
Questions.Example:
Please give a valid format HH:MM for when you will be starting your play session  

> **NOTE:** This time is in the UTC Timezone, you may not surpass the beginning of your play session after 11:59 PM Today.

Questions.Question: Reward
Questions.Name: Reward
Questions.Example:
How much robux will you be distributing to attendees?
> Please use ``0`` if this is a voluntary play session to attend.
